features: 【Exquisite Garden Hotel Building Toy】Experience the joy of building with this Garden Hotel Building Sets. 1300pcs mini building bricks, bring more challenges and fun. LED light add fun to your playtime. Assembled Size - 6(L)x5.1(W)x7.5H) inch.

【 Enhance Logical Thinking】We provide a very accurate step-by-step picture instructions and numbered package,help your children improve their logical thinking and problem-solving skills while enjoying the fun of building with these versatile building blocks toy.

【 Ideal Gift Choice】Surprise your loved ones with this engaging and educational building toy that provides hours of entertainment while enhancing cognitive abilities. Perfect gift for friend or kids on Halloween,Birthday party, Christmas, Valentines, New Year, Easter, Thanksgiving.etc,.

【Product Safety】All MindBox building block toy passed the CPSIA SAFETY TEST. All use ABS material, non-toxic and tasteless. The smooth bricks are safe for the children; bricks are tightly connected to each other, providing a perfect play experience and valuable building experience.

【After Sales Service 】 If you lose parts during the assembly process, please do not give up easily, because we have a local Amazon warehouse in the United States, which can quickly realize customer after-sales service. You can click Amazon's return button, and Amazon will provide you with return service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice looking mini brick kit.
reviews.reviewText: I am building all 4 of the mini brick kits. Looks good, but be aware these building to not have a back. Was missing one piece that I was able to find in my spare parts. Overall nice kit for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really cute! Absolutely loved the finished set, but getting there was challenging. I had to supplement and get creative with the pieces I had. The instructions were a little confusing at times as well. But, considering the price and I was able to complete it, it was a fun experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It is small (compared to a can in one of my pictures). but it was really fun to build! The pieces were small so they were easy to loose but if you keep track of them there is no actually pieces missing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing alot of pieces!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Received this item and right away it is SMALL...there's a 2lt in my photo for reference on size..that's fine as it's cute...but the pieces are very small and difficult to put together. This seems more appropriate for adults and teens...not kids per say. The main issue is from the beginning there pieces missing. Nothing that interrupted my building but very annoying. As I progressed to the second level there were finally main pieces missing that forced me to stop building. There was no way I or my husband could find a way to contact the company for replacement parts so my only option was to return/exchange to Amazon. So I broke down my original build and waited for my new box. It came and was also missing pieces as I put it together. Luckily (thanks to hubby) I had yet to return the original so between the two I finished it completely and returned the original box. Be prepared to do the same if you want this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kit, well designed, fun to build
reviews.reviewText: I had a lot of fun building this Coffee Shop model. No missing parts, as a matter of fact I had quite a few leftover pieces (did I miss something? I don’t think so). I wouldn’t recommend this for a beginner as there are many parts and reading the instructions can be challenging at times (no words just pictures). I’ve built cars and motorcycles with similar kits, this was my first building. And yes I’ve ordered another! For me this is like a 3D jigsaw puzzle.I think the instructions are excellent, pieces fit together correctly, all steps done in a logical order (from the floor up) and the final product is something I’m proud of. There are many inside items: tables and chairs, service counter top, cash register, record player, coffee mugs, donuts, plants inside and out, even an air conditioner!I spent 10-12 hours working on it. The last part of the roof is a bit unsteady in my opinion but that is the only negative I can think of. The string of tiny lights (with an on/off switch) adds a warm glow. If this was a real place I’d go in it for sure! 😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Pretty set, very detailed - missing pieces
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, detailed set. Super small pieces though and it doesn't fit on Lego pegs. But a nice way to pass the time.Updates review. So the above was for the first set that I did. I liked it enough to order another one. On that one I am missing at least 1 (maybe 2) bags of pieces for the 3rd section - and the base plates at that, so I can't even start it. I just ordered a replacement set from Amazon; hopefully with that I'll be able to complete the build and return an incomplete set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was my first Lego project; it was at times hard to understand the very small pieces. I could not tell the color difference on some of the pieces. Overall, I had fun putting it together, but the flowers were so hard to understand were each went. For my first Lego assembly I think I did pretty good and is fun to look at. The only thing I recommend to the company is have instruction in better color so people who wear glasses can tell the difference in the colors. Recommend to kids 10 and up... Have plenty of Light when working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not lego compatible
reviews.reviewText: I returned it after I saw the brinks were mini sized not regular lego sized.
